title: A letter sent from the Lord Falkland principal secretarie to His Majestie vnto the Right Honourable Henry Earle of Cumberland at York Sept. 30, 1642 concerning the late conflict before Worcester with the state of His Majesties armie now at Shrewsbury : together with His Majesties speech to the Gentry and Freeholders of the county of Salop, Septemb. 28, 1642.
author: Falkland, Lucius Cary, Viscount, 1610?-1643.
notes: "His Majesties speech at Shrewsburie" on p. [7].
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
